definitions.body: complete, whole, entire, Job 36:4 [[תְּמִים דֵעוֹת]], Job 37:16.
whole, sound healthful, of men Pr 1:12 (‖[[חַיִּים ]]); vine Ez Eze 15:5; usu. of sacrif. animals, P; Ex 12:5 + 40 t., so Ez Eze 43:22 + 10 t. †
complete, entire, of time: day Jos 10:13; year Le 25:30; Sabbaths Le 23:15. †

sound, wholesome, unimpaired, innocent, having integrity: of God’s way Ps 18:31 = 2Sa 22:31; work De 32:4; law Ps 19:8; elsewh. of man Ge 6:9, Ge 17:1 (P; both ‖[[אלהים ]] ([[לִפְנֵי]])[[הִתְהַלֵח אֵת ]]); ´[[עם י]] :´[[ת]]: De 18:13, Ps 18:24, c. [[ל]] in ‖ 2Sa 22:24; oft. c. [[דֶּרֶח]] way: ´[[דֶּרֶח ת]]: Ps 101:2; [[בִּדְרָכֶ֫יךָ]] ´[[ת]]: Ez Eze 28:15; [[תְּמִימֵי דָָרֶח]] Pr 11:20, Ps 119:1; [[דרכו]] ´[[וַיַּתֵּר ת]]: 2Sa 22:33 ‖ ´[[וַיִּתֵּן ת]]: [[דַּרְכִּי]] Ps 18:33; ´[[הלך בדרך ת]]: Ps 101:6; [[דֶּרֶח]] om., [[הלך תמים]], Pr 28:18, Ps 15:2; ´[[לב ת]]: Ps 119:80; = noun (late), man of integrity Pr 11:5, Job 12:4; pl. Pr 2:21, Pr 28:10, Ps 37:18. †

as neuter adj. = subst. what is complete, entirely in accord with truth and fact: ´[[דּׂ בֵר ת]]: Am 5:10; [[עֲשִׂיתֶם]]´[[אִם־בֶּאֱמֶת וּבְת]]: Ju Jdg 9:16, Jdg 9:19; [[עִבְדוּ]] [[וּבֶאֱמֶת]] ´[[בְּת]] :´[[י]]: Jos 24:14 (E); integrity ´[[גְּבַר ת]]: Ps 18:26 (cstr. Ges:§ 93 s; ‖ 2Sa 22:26 [[גִּבּוֹת]]), Ps 84:12; ´[[הׂלְכִים בְּת]]:.—1Sa 14:41 v. [[תּׂם]]
